kpi.name: M5003C13

kpi_info.title: DCH FP DATA FRAMES DISCARDED DUE TO HEADER CRC ERROR
kpi_info.use: Number of received FP data frames with CRC error from dedicated channels. UPDATED: The counter is updated at sampling intervals and when the connection is released.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH FP DATA FRAMES DISCARDED DUE TO HEADER CRC ERROR
